statements.delete: DELETE FROM glebeProperty WHERE EleID = #EleID# and SvgUID= #SvgUID#
DELETE FROM glebeProperty WHERE SvgUID= #SvgUID# and ObligateField16=#ObligateField16#
statements.update:
UPDATE glebeProperty SET
"ParentEleID"= #ParentEleID#
WHERE EleID = #EleID# and SvgUID= #SvgUID#

UPDATE glebeProperty SET
"ParentEleID"= #ParentEleID#
WHERE EleID = #EleID# and SvgUID= #SvgUID#
statements.select: SELECT "UID", "EleID", "UseID", "TypeUID", "Area", "Burthen", "Number", "Remark", "SonUid", "SelSonArea", "SvgUID", "ParentEleID", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7", "ObligateField8", "ObligateField9", "ObligateField10", "ObligateField11", "ObligateField12", "ObligateField13", "ObligateField14", "ObligateField15", "ObligateField16" FROM glebeProperty WHERE EleID= #EleID# and SvgUID= #SvgUID#

SELECT "UID", "EleID", "UseID", "TypeUID", "Area", "Burthen", "Number", "Remark", "SonUid", "SelSonArea", "SvgUID", "ParentEleID", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7", "ObligateField8", "ObligateField9", "ObligateField10", "ObligateField11", "ObligateField12", "ObligateField13", "ObligateField14", "ObligateField15", "ObligateField16" FROM glebeProperty WHERE SvgUID= #SvgUID# and ObligateField16=#ObligateField16# and ParentEleID=#ParentEleID#

SELECT "UID", "EleID", "UseID", "TypeUID", "Area", "Burthen", "Number", "Remark", "SonUid", "SelSonArea", "SvgUID", "ParentEleID", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7", "ObligateField8", "ObligateField9", "ObligateField10", "ObligateField11", "ObligateField12", "ObligateField13", "ObligateField14", "ObligateField15", "ObligateField16" FROM glebeProperty WHERE SvgUID= #SvgUID# and UseID= #UseID#

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, '组合地块' as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11, a.ObligateField12, a.ObligateField13, a.ObligateField14, a.ObligateField15, a.ObligateField16 FROM glebeProperty a WHERE a.ParentEleID = #ParentEleID# and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# and a.LayerID in ($LayerID$) order by a.UseID

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, '组合地块' as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11, a.ObligateField12, a.ObligateField13, a.ObligateField14, a.ObligateField15, a.ObligateField16 FROM glebeProperty a WHERE a.ParentEleID = #ParentEleID# and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# order by a.UseID

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeName as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, b.ObligateField1 as ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11, a.ObligateField12, a.ObligateField13, a.ObligateField14, a.ObligateField15, a.ObligateField16 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID = #ParentEleID# and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# order by a.UseID

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeName as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11, a.ObligateField12, a.ObligateField13, a.ObligateField14, a.ObligateField15, a.ObligateField16 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID !='0' and a.ParentEleID!='' and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# and a.LayerID in ( $LayerID$ ) order by a.UseID

SELECT '' as "UID", '' as "EleID", '' as "UseID", b.TypeName as "TypeUID", sum(a.Area) as "Area", sum(a.Burthen) as "Burthen", sum(a.Burthen)/sum(a.Area) as "Number", '' as "Remark", '' as "SonUid", '' as "SelSonArea", '' as "SvgUID", '' as "ParentEleID", '' as "LayerID", '' as "ObligateField1", '' as "ObligateField2", '' as "ObligateField3", '' as "ObligateField4", '' as "ObligateField5", '' as "ObligateField6", '' as "ObligateField7", '' as "ObligateField8", '' as "ObligateField9", '' as "ObligateField10", '' as "ObligateField11", '' as "ObligateField12", '' as "ObligateField13", '' as "ObligateField14", '' as "ObligateField15", '' as "ObligateField16" FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID !='0' and a.ParentEleID!='' and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# and a.LayerID in ( $LayerID$ ) group by b.TypeName

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeName as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, b.ObligateField1 as ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11, a.ObligateField12, a.ObligateField13, a.ObligateField14, a.ObligateField15, a.ObligateField16 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID !='0' and a.ParentEleID!='' and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# order by a.UseID

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeStyle as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, bak.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11, a.ObligateField12, a.ObligateField13, a.ObligateField14, a.ObligateField15, a.ObligateField16 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b ,glebeProperty bak WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID !='0' and a.ParentEleID!='' and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# and a.ParentEleID=bak.EleID order by a.UseID

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeStyle as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11, a.ObligateField12, a.ObligateField13, a.ObligateField14, a.ObligateField15, a.ObligateField16 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID ='1' and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID#

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeStyle as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11, a.ObligateField12, a.ObligateField13, a.ObligateField14, a.ObligateField15, a.ObligateField16 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID !='0' and a.EleID=#EleID# and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID#
